data.value: Please reduce the proprietor's name to fewer than 70 characters

data.value: You have to remove the link(s) before changing this type of establishment. Please remove the link(s)

data.name: field.validation.CloseDate
data.value: Please change the close date, so it's later than the open date.

data.name: field.validation.Diocese
data.value: Only Church of England or Roman Catholic church schools can have a diocese. Please remove the diocese

data.name: field.validation.EstablishmentStatus.future.close.date
data.value: You can't close an establishment with a future close date. Please enter a different close date

data.name: field.validation.EstablishmentStatus.future.open.date
